name: ai.cerb.record.profileImageEditor.fetchUrl
description: Create a profile image from a URL
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      title: Fetch image by URL
      elements:
        text/prompt_url:
          label: URL:
          required@bool: yes
          type: url
          placeholder: https://example.com/image.png
          max_length: 1024
  
  return:
    image:
      url@key: prompt_url
policy_kata:
commands:
  # [TODO] Specify a command policy here (use Ctrl+Space for autocompletion)
